tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE investment_performance (
  investment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  investment_name VARCHAR(255),
  investment_type VARCHAR(50),
  investment_date DATE,
  investment_amount DECIMAL(12, 2),
  investment_return DECIMAL(8, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE investments (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_name VARCHAR(255),
    investment_type VARCHAR(50),
    investment_date DATE,
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_performance (
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_rate DECIMAL(5,2),
    performance_value DECIMAL(10,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (investment_id) REFERENCES investments(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Investment (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_name VARCHAR(255),
    investor_id UUID,
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Portfolios (
    portfolio_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_name TEXT,
    investor_id INT,
    stock_id INT,
    investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Performance (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id INT,
    performance_metric TEXT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Investment (
    investment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    investment_type TEXT,
    investment_amount DECIMAL,
    investment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Investor (
    investor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investor_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    investor_type TEXT,
    investor_email TEXT,
    investor_phone TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentPerformance (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT references Investment(investment_id),
    investor_id INT references Investor(investor_id),
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_value DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentReturns (
    return_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id INT references Investment(investment_id),
    investor_id INT references Investor(investor_id),
    return_date DATE,
    return_value DECIMAL
);
